Interface SensorPoller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LightSensorPoller, UltrasonicSensorPoller

    public interface SensorPoller
    This is the interface for sensors.
    Author:
    Pengnan Fan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getData()
      This method immediately returns a measurement.
      float getData(int MEASURING_SCOPE)
      This method returns the average measurement of a sensor.

    • Method Detail

      • getData

        float getData(int MEASURING_SCOPE)
        This method returns the average measurement of a sensor.
        Parameters:
        MEASURING_SCOPE - This is a int value for the number of measurements for averaging.
        Returns:
        This method returns the average result.

      • getData

        float getData()
        This method immediately returns a measurement.
        Returns:
        This method returns the result for one measurement.
